item.title: @elonmusk: Even assuming there was no fraud, none of this makes sense. How is it that we have been funding bill...
item.description: Even assuming there was no fraud, none of this makes sense. How is it that we have been funding billions of dollars of daycare for Somali immigrants in Minnesota 81% of which (according to Gemini) are on welfare? In other words, if mom and dad don‚Äôt work, why the need for child care? Perhaps you could say the welfare statistics include some subsidies for working parents, but still in this case, the child care does not appear to be needed as the daycare centers are empty. Furthermore, why is Federal funded childcare provided to recent immigrants on welfare versus long-standing American working families who are not on welfare? How does this make sense?

item.title: @elonmusk: I like how he just tries to slide in the phrase ‚ÄúWhite men commit the most crime‚Äù like it‚Äôs a given ...
item.description: I like how he just tries to slide in the phrase ‚ÄúWhite men commit the most crime‚Äù like it‚Äôs a given Here‚Äôs the homicide data for the state of Minnesota, and the total crime data for Hennepin county Not only do white people not commit the most crime, they don‚Äôt even commit most of the crimeS You have 5x as many white people in Minnesota as black people. Somehow the 169K black people committed almost twice the total number of crimes that 857K white people did over the same time span I get that it‚Äôs tacky to bring up crime stats but this is utter horseshit, and an outright, bald-faced lie. I‚Äôm not going to just sit here and accept him saying this and not push back

item.title: @elonmusk: I went to 4 more Somali childcare locations today. Two told me they weren‚Äôt childcares despite recei...
item.description: I went to 4 more Somali childcare locations today. Two told me they weren‚Äôt childcares despite receiving hundreds of thousands of tax payer dollars. One which claimed they weren‚Äôt a childcare received over $800,000 since 2023. It‚Äôs all on camera. It will be uncovered.

item.title: @elonmusk: Only about 6 months ago, Giga Berlin produced the 8 millionth vehicle globally and now we hit the 9 ...
item.description: Only about 6 months ago, Giga Berlin produced the 8 millionth vehicle globally and now we hit the 9 million vehicles milestone! Insane accomplishment by our 4 factories around the globe! Cannot wait for the 10 millionth car to be produced!

item.description: It‚Äôs this simple, folks: stop all illegal immigration. Deport all illegal aliens here now. Enact Voter ID laws. That will solve every problem America has. We will reduce taxes, stop crime, fraud, Democrat DEI scams, inflation, homelessness, and the housing crisis.

item.title: @elonmusk: Turning off payments and forcing verification before taxpayer money flows out the door is one of the...
item.description: Turning off payments and forcing verification before taxpayer money flows out the door is one of the most important steps we can take to end the fraud in Minnesota. But there will be many more to come. Great job to@HHS_Jimand@SecKennedy.
